data.name: Hero of the Kingdom II Demo
data.supported_languages: English, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Turkish, Czech, Portuguese - Brazil, Hungarian, Polish, Italian, Dutch, Ukrainian, Danish, Simplified Chinese

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8, 10
  • Processor: 1.0 GHz
  • Graphics: 128 MB, DirectX 9.0
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 470 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Mouse or touch control

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.8 Mountain Lion
  • Processor: 1.0 GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 128 MB, OpenGL 2.0
  • Storage: 470 MB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Steam compatible 64-bit Linux distribution
  • Processor: 1.0 GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 128 MB, OpenGL 2.0
  • Storage: 470 MB available space
